casebody.data:
Lori Beth HUTTERLY, et al.
v.
David Edward MILLER Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 20, 2017

Robert S. Kolesnik, Sr., in support of the petition.

John L. Laudati, in opposition.

The named plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 40331) is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
